content:
267 "Most Boomers think the universities are just kooky like the 60s, with a bunch of anti-war potheads who will grow out of it. 

They just can’t be made to understand what’s really happened on campus." posted 20 hours ago by bleeje 23 comments award share report block Oilfield Rando @Oilfield_Rando • 1d Most Boomers think the universities are just kooky like the 60s, with a bunch of anti-war potheads who will grow out of it. They just can’t be made to understand what’s really happened on campus.

You want to be a bit more honest with what happened in 2020 and everything the youngest voters voted for like minimum wage increases?  The economy was hotter than mexican shit in 2019, then the democrats released the virus from Wuhan just in time for the election and I am sure you have at least basic knowledge of the history that transpired after that point? permalink parent award report block reply 27Sandino 3 points 18 hours ago people born between 46 and 64 are the sole cause of my problems Fuck you morons for making me defend boomers, this is the lowest iq argument on the internet,  it's not the banking cartel, offshoring, globalists, Muslim hordes, immigration,  it's Archie bunker It's 60 years later and you're still blaming boomers like a bunch of joggers whining about slavery, this generation is bitch made permalink parent award report block reply SicSemperTyrannis2 1 points 13 hours ago Fun fact: Archie Bunker was over the top satire, and did more to remove racism than MLK permalink parent award report block reply Standingoak 0 points 15 hours ago Be kind , "Every generation ,blames the one before" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5hr64MxYpgk&list=RD5hr64MxYpgk&start_radio=1 permalink parent award report block reply Standingoak 3 points 15 hours ago Was the Boomers Grand Parents who were around for the 1913 Revolution that started and caused it all. I told him it could happen until a conservative generation took over first. You know so the hippies could cannibalize everything they built. permalink award report block reply UNfreeNewZealand 1 points 11 hours ago That’s a big generalisation.
Many parents of Boomers grew up in war against Socialism/Communism.
